評論區太酷了：

Water Dog Fish: "When governments fear the people, there is liberty. When the people fear the government, there is tyranny." - Thomas Jefferson（譯：“當政府懼怕人民時，人民有的是自由。當人民懼怕政府時，人民受的是暴政。” - 托馬斯·杰斐遜）

Moh Amuza: Edward Snowden: The NSA is watching you secretly! 
China Government: let me show you how I do it publicly!!（譯：愛德華·斯諾登：國家安全局暗中監視著你！中國政府：讓我告訴你我如何公開監視你！！）

terrence bryant: That is nowhere near enough toilet pape（譯：這公測裡手紙不

SickPrid3: Crosschecked with "criminal database" aka "list of people with different view than The Party"（譯：我看所謂的罪犯名單其實不就是個見解與黨不同的人的名單麼。）

angela: this literally is the "1984" george orwell described（譯：這不完全就是上是喬治·奧威爾的《1984》麼。）
